summary: A comprehensive interview with Dmitry Matskevich, CEO of Dbrain, by Benjamin Davis from Cointelegraph TV, discussing the intersection of AI and blockchain.

events_list.video_caption: The video opens with a black screen filled with small white dots resembling stars, creating a cosmic atmosphere. The scene transitions to a logo animation featuring the text 'BLOCK' in bold, orange and blue letters, with a stylized 'X' in the background, set against a starry backdrop. The logo animation concludes with the 'COINTELEGRAPH' logo in white text on a black background. The scene then shifts to an indoor setting where two men are engaged in an interview. The interviewer, holding a microphone with the 'COINTELEGRAPH' logo, is dressed in a black t-shirt and pants, while the interviewee, identified by on-screen text as 'Dmitry Matskevich, CEO of DBRAIN,' wears a black t-shirt with the 'DBRAIN' logo. The background features a modern, circular architectural design with orange and yellow tones, and the 'COINTELEGRAPH' logo is visible in the top right corner. The interviewee speaks into the microphone, gesturing with his hands, while the interviewer listens attentively. The video maintains a professional and engaging atmosphere throughout, with the interviewee's responses and the interviewer's attentive demeanor highlighted against the visually striking background.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with music in a hip-hop style, setting an energetic mood. Then, a male speaker starts by introducing himself and Coin Telegraph TV, asking the interviewee to introduce himself. The male interviewee responds with confidence, introducing himself as Dimitri, the founder of Dbrain, a human-in-the-loop platform that operates on blockchain for AI solutions.

events_list.video_caption: The video opens with a vibrant graphic featuring a geometric design in shades of blue and orange, accompanied by the text "YOUR JOURNEY INTO THE SPACE" and "MATSKEVICH" in bold white letters, setting a futuristic tone. The scene transitions to an indoor setting where two men are engaged in an interview. The interviewer, dressed in a black t-shirt and holding a microphone with the "COINTELEGRAPH" logo, conducts the interview with the interviewee, who is wearing a black t-shirt with the word "brain" printed on it. The background features a modern architectural design with circular patterns and warm lighting, creating a professional atmosphere. The interviewee speaks animatedly, using hand gestures to emphasize his points, while the interviewer listens attentively, occasionally nodding in agreement. The video maintains a consistent focus on the interaction between the two men, highlighting their expressions and body language as they discuss their experiences and insights. The interview takes place in a well-lit, spacious room with a distinctive circular design element, adding to the modern and professional ambiance of the setting. The video concludes with a close-up of the interviewee, capturing his expressions and gestures as he continues to speak, maintaining the engaging and informative tone of the interview.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker being asked about their start in the field and their journey. The speaker describes a long story of working in artificial intelligence for the past ten years, selling their company a year ago, and gathering a team of computer vision experts to apply recent papers to real-world business problems. Background noise accompanies the speech, contributing to an ambiance suggestive of a busy and bustling environment.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview conducted by a reporter holding a microphone with the "COINTELEGRAPH" logo, interviewing a man wearing a black t-shirt with the word "brain" printed on it. The setting is a modern, well-lit room with a distinctive orange and grey color scheme, including a large circular window and a patterned floor. The interviewee is seen speaking and gesturing with his hands, indicating an engaging conversation. The reporter listens attentively, holding the microphone towards the interviewee. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the "COINTELEGRAPH" logo visible in the top right corner of the frames, suggesting the context of a media or technology-related discussion. The video captures the dynamic interaction between the interviewer and the interviewee, highlighting their expressions and body language as they communicate.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker describing how they build a number of use cases, giving an example of a factory that produces meat, and tracks every action of any human in the field. The speaker sounds informative and business-like. He then gives an example of automatic quality control for pizza, cancer detection, and automatic retouch of any photo.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview conducted by a reporter holding a microphone with the "Cointelegraph" logo, as indicated by the logo visible in the top right corner of the frames. The interviewee, wearing a black t-shirt with the word "brain" printed on it, is engaged in a conversation with the reporter, who is dressed in a black t-shirt and dark pants. The setting is a modern, well-lit room with a distinctive orange circular design on the wall and a patterned floor. The atmosphere is professional, and the focus is on the interaction between the interviewer and the interviewee, with the latter gesturing with his hands while speaking. The video captures the dynamic exchange between the two individuals, highlighting their expressions and body language as they discuss a topic of interest.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker discussing AI solutions, noting that "80% of the problem is data" and that the focus is now on "building this like platform for people". He mentions enabling individuals across the globe, from India, Nigeria, Indonesia, to work on data generation, cleaning, and cross-validation for the platform. He then states that in every use case, "80 or 90% of value creation" is present. The soundscape involves some consistent background noise, suggesting a busy or public environment.

events_list.video_caption: The video opens with a graphic featuring the name "Dmitry Matskevich" and the topic "Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Clarified," set against a colorful geometric background with the CoinTelegraph logo in the top right corner. The scene transitions to a man with curly hair, wearing a black shirt and a lanyard, holding a microphone with the CoinTelegraph logo, speaking against a plain, dark background. The focus then shifts to a wider shot of two men standing in a modern, circular room with orange and gray tones, engaged in conversation. One man, wearing a black shirt with the word "brain" on it, is seen speaking into a microphone, with the CoinTelegraph logo visible in the top right corner. The video continues with a close-up of the same man, emphasizing his facial expressions and gestures as he speaks, with the background remaining consistent. The video concludes with a graphic displaying the CoinTelegraph logo and the text "COINTELEGRAPH" in bold white letters against a black background, reinforcing the branding of the video.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with two male speakers discussing common misconceptions about AI. The first man introduces the topic, mentioning that people talk about how the public has many misconceptions about AI.  The second man responds, agreeing and clarifying that AI is currently just a simple pattern recognizer, requiring lots of data. He emphasizes that AI isn't about computation power or complex algorithms, but about the data generated by humans, not just high-paid engineers. In the background, ambient sounds suggest a bustling outdoor environment, with consistent rhythmic elements of music, perhaps a drumbeat.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview conducted by a person holding a microphone with the CoinTelegraph logo, interviewing Dmitry Matskevich, who is wearing a black t-shirt with the word "brain" printed on it. The setting is a modern, circular room with orange and grey tones, featuring a large circular window and a patterned floor. The interviewee, Dmitry, is seen gesturing with his hands while speaking, indicating an engaging conversation. The interviewer, dressed in a black t-shirt and a lanyard, listens attentively and occasionally responds. The video opens with a graphic overlay displaying the name "Dmitry Matskevich" and the question "Where is A.J. today?" in bold white text on a pink background, with the CoinTelegraph logo in the top right corner. The video maintains a professional and focused atmosphere throughout, with the interviewee actively participating in the discussion.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a man asking a question on how AI is impacting lives, specifically asking about incorporation of AI in the world right now. Another man responds, initially focusing on B2B applications of AI, but agrees to provide some B2C examples for understanding.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview conducted by a man holding a microphone, dressed in a black t-shirt and dark pants, with a lanyard around his neck. He is interviewing another man, also in a black t-shirt and dark pants, who is gesturing with his hands while speaking. The setting is a modern, well-lit room with a distinctive orange and grey color scheme, including a large circular window and patterned flooring. events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a male speaker discussing examples of artificial intelligence, such as face recognition in a new iPhone and the ability of cameras in Google and Apple devices to enhance selfies and reduce noise in dark environments. The speaker speaks in a casual, informative tone.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview conducted by a reporter holding a microphone with the "COINTELEGRAPH" logo, indicating the media outlet. The interviewee, dressed in a black t-shirt with white text, is engaged in a conversation with the reporter, who is wearing a black t-shirt and a lanyard with a badge. The setting is characterized by a modern design with orange and yellow vertical elements in the background, creating a warm and professional atmosphere. Throughout the video, the interviewee is seen gesturing with his hands while speaking, emphasizing his points. The camera alternates between close-up shots of the interviewee and wider shots showing both individuals in the interview setting. The video maintains a consistent focus on the interaction between the reporter and the interviewee, highlighting their discussion in a visually appealing environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features a single male speaker discussing self-driving cars and their implications for the surveillance industry, mentioning that it's a huge risky case for the latter and the potential for AI to replace human camera watchers. The speaker maintains a clear and informative tone. During the talk, background sounds suggest an environment with vehicular traffic, potentially a street or parking area, giving context to the mentioned topics.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview conducted by a reporter holding a microphone, dressed in a black t-shirt and a lanyard with a badge, with another individual wearing a black t-shirt with the word "dbrain" printed on it. The setting is indoors, characterized by a modern design with a large circular orange structure and a green wall in the background. The interviewee, who is actively gesturing with his hands while speaking, appears engaged in the conversation. The video includes close-up shots of the interviewee, highlighting his facial expressions and the details of his t-shirt. The logo of "COINTELEGRAPH" is visible in the top right corner throughout the video. The interview concludes with a graphic overlay displaying the name "Dmitry Matskevich" and the text "Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence," indicating the topic of discussion. The overall atmosphere is professional and focused on the exchange of ideas related to technology and innovation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker discussing AI in healthcare, specifically how it can aid pathologists in analyzing biopsy images by highlighting areas of interest.  His tone is informative and technical. This transitions into a more casual, conversational tone as the speaker shifts to the topic of blockchain. The speaker shifts to a more casual, conversational tone as he mentions blockchain and a talk show. Simultaneously in the background, generic dance music with a strong bassline is playing.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview conducted by a reporter, identifiable by his microphone and lanyard, with a man dressed in a black t-shirt. They are situated in a room with a distinctive orange and green color scheme, highlighted by a large circular window that allows natural light to filter in. The reporter, holding a microphone, engages in conversation with the interviewee, who gestures with his hands while speaking. The setting appears to be a professional environment, possibly a conference or event, as indicated by the presence of the "COINTELEGRAPH" logo in the top right corner of the frames. The atmosphere is casual yet focused, with both individuals appearing engaged in the discussion. The video alternates between wider shots of the two men and close-ups, emphasizing their facial expressions and gestures, which suggest a dynamic and informative exchange. The background remains consistent throughout, with the circular window and the room's design elements providing a visually appealing backdrop to the interview.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker discussing the merging of blockchain and AI as a significant trend, inquiring about the impact of blockchain technology on AI development and the speed or changes it may have introduced. The speaker's tone is conversational and inquisitive. Another male speaker responds, acknowledging the question as a good one and stating their focus isn't on buzzwords like merging blockchain with AI. Throughout the dialogue, consistent background ambient sounds are present.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview conducted in a modern, well-lit room with a distinctive orange and grey color scheme. The interviewer, dressed in a black t-shirt and wearing a lanyard with an ID badge, holds a microphone and engages in conversation with the interviewee, who is also dressed in a black t-shirt. The interviewee uses hand gestures to emphasize points during the discussion. The background includes a large, circular orange structure with a window, adding a unique architectural element to the setting. The logo of "COINTELEGRAPH" is visible in the top right corner of the frames, indicating the media outlet conducting the interview. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with both individuals appearing engaged in the conversation. The video alternates between close-up shots of the interviewee and wider shots showing both individuals in the room, highlighting the dynamic interaction between them.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a single male speaker with a clear and informative tone, discussing the application of blockchain technology to make a marketplace for data segmenting more efficient. He mentions that "two billions of people are unbanked globally," highlighting their inability to earn fiat currency digitally. His speech is accompanied by consistent background noise that suggests an outdoor setting.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview conducted by a reporter, identifiable by his lanyard and microphone, with a man dressed in a black t-shirt. They are situated in a room with a distinctive orange and green color scheme, highlighted by a large circular design on the wall. The interviewee, who is actively gesturing with his hands, appears to be explaining something with enthusiasm. The setting is modern and well-lit, with the "COINTELEGRAPH" logo visible in the top right corner, indicating the media outlet conducting the interview. The atmosphere is professional, and the focus remains on the interaction between the interviewer and the interviewee, with occasional close-up shots emphasizing the interviewee's expressions and gestures.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features one male speaker discussing leveraging blockchain technology to reach people and bring them to a platform for real work and earning. He speaks with a confident and informative tone, explaining how blockchain eliminates trust issues and ensures data security. The clip doesn't contain any background music or ambient sounds.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview setting with two men standing in front of a large, circular, orange structure with a window-like design. The interviewer, wearing a black t-shirt and a lanyard with a badge, holds a microphone and engages in conversation with the interviewee, who is dressed in a black t-shirt and pants. The interviewee gestures with his hands while speaking, and the interviewer listens attentively. The background is a muted green wall with orange accents, and the floor has a patterned design. The logo of 'COINTELEGRAPH' is visible in the top right corner throughout the video. The scene transitions to a graphic overlay with the text 'DMITRY MATSKEVICH' and 'THE FUTURE OF A.I.' in bold white letters on a colorful geometric background, indicating the interviewee's name and the topic of discussion. The video then returns to the interview setting, where the conversation continues with the same individuals and background. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the interviewee actively participating in the discussion.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker, stating that "Arsenal in AI is a real issue" and explains how stolen data effectively means stealing an AI solution, as it constitutes a significant portion. Another male speaker interjects with affirmation. The first speaker continues, stating "that's how we leverage blockchain here". A new male speaker comes in mentioning projects and describing them as "fun and really interesting". Meanwhile, throughout the clip, the ambiance is filled with what sounds like an outdoor environment, with moderate background noise, including wind.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, two men are engaged in a conversation in a modern, well-lit indoor setting with a distinctive orange and grey color scheme. The man on the left, wearing a black t-shirt and a lanyard with a badge, holds a microphone and appears to be interviewing the man on the right, who is also dressed in a black t-shirt and is gesturing with his hands as he speaks. The background features a large, circular orange structure with a window-like design, adding a contemporary feel to the environment. The logo of "COINTELEGRAPH" is visible in the top right corner, indicating the media outlet covering the event. The video alternates between close-up shots of the two men, focusing on their facial expressions and gestures, emphasizing the dynamic nature of their discussion. The atmosphere is professional and engaging, with both individuals appearing attentive and involved in the conversation.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker expressing excitement about AI and forecasting its future integration, particularly in cognitive routine tasks currently done by humans, like driving, pattern recognition and even pathologist work, suggesting AI already outperforms humans in many of these areas. His tone is enthusiastic and forward-looking. The audio ends with a short period of synth-pop music playing, with a bright and energizing tone.
